en:
<VOICE>(VA070_001)Stand back, Adecor!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_002)I'll handle this in the name of
the Imperial Knights.
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_001)¡Atrás, Adecor!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_002)Me ocuparé de esto en nombre
de los Caballeros Imperiales.
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_001)Stand back, Adecor!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_002)I'll handle this in the name of
the Imperial Knights.

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_003)I say, I shall be the one to defend the 
good name of the Imperial Knights!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_004)Peons, I say, should stand back!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_003)¡Seré yo quien defienda el honrado nombre
de los Caballeros Imperiales, proclamo!<PAGE><VOICE>(VA070_004)¡Los edecanes deberían retirarse, proclamo!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_003)I say, I shall be the one to defend the 
good name of the Imperial Knights!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_004)Peons, I say, should stand back!

en: <VOICE>(VA070_006)No, no, I say, I am your superior!
es: <VOICE>(VA070_006)¡No, no, yo soy tu superior, proclamo!
ja: <VOICE>(VA070_006)No, no, I say, I am your superior!

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_007)I appreciate the sentiment, 
guys, but let's cut the catfight 
and get on with it!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_007)Os lo agradezco, chicos,
pero será mejor que nos dejemos
de memeces y vayamos al grano.
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_007)I appreciate the sentiment, 
guys, but let's cut the catfight 
and get on with it!

en:
The control is set to semi-auto
mode during this battle.
es:
El control está configurado como
semi-auto durante esta batalla.
ja:
The control is set to semi-auto
mode during this battle.

en:
Move forward and backward with <06>(LTR)<06>(LTL).
Jump with <06>(GUD)＋<06>(LTU).
es:
Muévete hacia delante y hacia atrás con <06>(LTR)<06>(LTL).
Salta con <06>(GUD)＋<06>(LTU).
ja:
Move forward and backward with <06>(LTR)<06>(LTL).
Jump with <06>(GUD)＋<06>(LTU).

en:
Target nearest enemy using <06>(CBR1).
Change your target with <06>(LTN) while 
holding  <06>(CBR1).
es:
Cambia tu objetivo al más cercano con <06>(CBR1).
Cambia tu objetivo con <06>(LTN) mientras pulsas <06>(CBR1).
ja:
Target nearest enemy using <06>(CBR1).
Change your target with <06>(LTN) while 
holding  <06>(CBR1).

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_010)Nay, Boccos! You are, I say, 
clearly my subordinate!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_010)¡Ni hablar, Boccos! ¡Resulta obvio
que tú eres mi subordinado, proclamo!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_010)Nay, Boccos! You are, I say, 
clearly my subordinate!

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_011)I guess I just gotta whack 
these guys a little.
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_011)Veo que voy a tener
que zurrarles un poco.
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_011)I guess I just gotta whack 
these guys a little.

en:
You can also perform attacks with <06>(ATK)
while moving with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
es:
También puedes atacar con <06>(ATK)
mientras te mueves con <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
ja:
You can also perform attacks with <06>(ATK)
while moving with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).

en:
Target will automatically switch 
to the enemy you hit while moving 
with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
es:
Tu objetivo cambiará automáticamente
al enemigo que ataques mientras
te mueves con <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
ja:
Target will automatically switch 
to the enemy you hit while moving 
with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_014)How dare you! Hitting someone in the middle 
of an argument is hardly proper manners!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_014)¡Cómo te atreves! ¡Pegar a alguien que
está discutiendo es de muy mala educación!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_014)How dare you! Hitting someone in the middle 
of an argument is hardly proper manners!

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_015)Didn't you hear me when I said "You 
ready?" Or were you not listening?
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_015)¿No me habéis oído cuando os he dicho si
estabais listos? ¿O es que no me hacíais caso?
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_015)Didn't you hear me when I said "You 
ready?" Or were you not listening?

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_025)Oooh! I say, 
how DARE you block 
my arte!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_025)¡Oooh! ¡Cómo os
atrevéis a bloquear
mi arte, proclamo!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_025)Oooh! I say, 
how DARE you block 
my arte!

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_026)Man, you need to calm down...
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_027)If you can use strike artes 
here, then I can too!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_026)Tío, cálmate un poco...<PAGE><VOICE>(VA070_027)¡Si puedes usar artes
de ataque, yo también!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_026)Man, you need to calm down...
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_027)If you can use strike artes 
here, then I can too!

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_028)Let's try that again. This 
next one's gonna hurt...!
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_028)Volvamos a intentarlo.
¡Esto sí que va a doler!
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_028)Let's try that again. This 
next one's gonna hurt...!

en:
Perform combo by using regular attack <06>(ATK)
followed by artes attack <06>(ART).
es: Haz combos usando ataques normales <06>(ATK)y después usando artes <06>(ART).
ja:
Perform combo by using regular attack <06>(ATK)
followed by artes attack <06>(ART).

en:
<VOICE>(VA070_029)Aw, you're not giving 
up already, are you?
es:
<VOICE>(VA070_029)Oh, no iréis a tirar
la toalla, ¿verdad?
ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_029)Aw, you're not giving 
up already, are you?

en: <VOICE>(VA070_030)I-I say, Imperial Knights never give up!
es: <VOICE>(VA070_030)¡Los Caballeros Imperiales nunca se rinden, proclamo!
ja: <VOICE>(VA070_030)I-I say, Imperial Knights never give up!

en: <VOICE>(VA070_031)You have yet to see our true power!
es: <VOICE>(VA070_031)¡Aún no has visto nuestro verdadero poder!
ja: <VOICE>(VA070_031)You have yet to see our true power!

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_057)Man, just when I thought I was being sneaky, 
things have to go to hell.
es:
<VOICE>(VS03_057)Qué mala pata, justo cuando creía que podría
escaquearme, ha tenido que irse todo al cuerno.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_057)Man, just when I thought I was being sneaky, 
things have to go to hell.

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_058)Careful, I think he's 
got a blastia.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_058)Careful, I think he's 
got a blastia.

en: <VOICE>(VS03_059)It shouldn't be a problem if we take him together.
es: <VOICE>(VS03_059)No debería suponer un problema si atacamos juntos.
ja: <VOICE>(VS03_059)It shouldn't be a problem if we take him together.

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_116)You feel what? I'm not feeling 
anything over here.
es:
<VOICE>(VS03_116)¿Sentir el qué? Yo no
siento nada de nada.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_116)You feel what? I'm not feeling 
anything over here.

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_119)That's it! That's 
it! Now I feel 
truly alive!
es:
<VOICE>(VS03_119)¡Eso es! ¡Eso es!
¡Ahora me siento
vivo de verdad!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_119)That's it! That's 
it! Now I feel 
truly alive!

en: <VOICE>(VS03_120)What's with him all of a sudden?
es: <VOICE>(VS03_120)Pero ¿qué mosca le ha picado al tío este?
ja: <VOICE>(VS03_120)What's with him all of a sudden?

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_127)If things get out of 
hand, run for it.
es:
<VOICE>(VS03_127)Si las cosas se salen
de madre, sal pitando.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_127)If things get out of 
hand, run for it.

en:
<VOICE>(VS03_129)Oh, don't give up so soon. 
I haven't had a fight like 
this in years!
es:
<VOICE>(VS03_129)Oh, no te rindas tan pronto.
¡Hace años que no disfruto
de un combate como este!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_129)Oh, don't give up so soon. 
I haven't had a fight like 
this in years!

en:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!
es:
¡Despídete de tu libertad,
pues la pata vas a estirar!
ja:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!

en:
I say, prepare to face the Imperial 
Knights' ultimate fighting 
arte, the Over Limit!
es:
¡Preparaos para sufrir el arte
definitivo de los Caballeros
Imperiales, el Límite, proclamo!
ja:
I say, prepare to face the Imperial 
Knights' ultimate fighting 
arte, the Over Limit!

en:
The Over Limit doesn't belong to the Knights! 
Anyone can do it, last time I checked.
es:
¡El Límite no es de los Caballeros!
Que yo sepa, cualquiera puede hacerlo.
ja:
The Over Limit doesn't belong to the Knights! 
Anyone can do it, last time I checked.

en:
It's a technique to increase your abilities 
while fighting. How do you do it again?
es:
Es una técnica que mejora tus habilidades
mientras luchas. ¿Cómo se hacía?...
ja:
It's a technique to increase your abilities 
while fighting. How do you do it again?

en: You fool! How could you forget something like that?
ja: You fool! How could you forget something like that?

en:
I say, I shall jog your memory!
<PAGE>
But after that, I say, I shall 
give you a non-stop ticket 
on the train of death!
es:
¡Os refrescaré la memoria, proclamo!
<PAGE>¡Pero después os daré
un billete de ida hacia
la muerte, proclamo!
ja:
I say, I shall jog your memory!
<PAGE>
But after that, I say, I shall 
give you a non-stop ticket 
on the train of death!

en:
Oh, right. You attack 
the enemy, and that
raises your battle spirit.
es:
Ah, es verdad. Atacas a
tu enemigo para aumentar
tu espíritu de lucha.
ja:
Oh, right. You attack 
the enemy, and that
raises your battle spirit.

en:
Blast! Your hits are not 
connecting at all!
ja:
Blast! Your hits are not 
connecting at all!

en:
Ouch... I say, that hurt...
I cannot, I say, stand this
any longer...!
es:
Ay... Qué daño, proclamo.
¡No aguanto más, proclamo!
ja:
Ouch... I say, that hurt...
I cannot, I say, stand this
any longer...!

en:
Oh yeah, your battle spirit goes 
up if you're attacked, too.
es:
Ah, no me acordaba que tu espíritu de
lucha también aumenta si te atacan.
ja:
Oh yeah, your battle spirit goes 
up if you're attacked, too.

en:
The gauge fills up as you attack
or when you receive an attack.
es:
La barra se irá llenando
conforme ataques o recibas daño.
ja:
The gauge fills up as you attack
or when you receive an attack.

en:
All right...and then, if you release the 
battle spirit that you've stored up...
es:
Muy bien. Y cuando sueltas el espíritu
de batalla que has estado acumulando...
ja:
All right...and then, if you release the 
battle spirit that you've stored up...

en: Press <06>(LBN) to go into Over Limit
ja: Press <06>(LBN) to go into Over Limit

en:
You can use basic attacks and artes
consecutively during an Over Limit.
es:
Puedes usar ataques básicos y artes
sin parar durante el Límite.
ja:
You can use basic attacks and artes
consecutively during an Over Limit.

en: We mustn't let his power charge up any more!
es: ¡No debemos dejar que su poder aumente!
ja: We mustn't let his power charge up any more!

en: I've got you just where I want you...
ja: I've got you just where I want you...

en: I think I'll try to do that thing.
ja: I think I'll try to do that thing.

en:
You can't just imitate what you 
saw and hope it'll work...
es:
No puedes imitar algo que acabas
de ver y esperar que funcione...
ja:
You can't just imitate what you 
saw and hope it'll work...

en:
Is it something that
can be done so easily...?
es:
¿De verdad se puede
hacer tan fácilmente?
ja:
Is it something that
can be done so easily...?

en:
Hey, I won't know if I can until 
I try. How did it go again?
es:
Bueno, no lo sabré hasta que lo intente.
¿Cómo has dicho que se hacía?
ja:
Hey, I won't know if I can until 
I try. How did it go again?

en:
Uh, uhh, first, you go 
and attack the enemy to 
throw it off balance...
es:
Eh, pues... primero vas
y atacas al enemigo para
que pierda el equilibrio...
ja:
Uh, uhh, first, you go 
and attack the enemy to 
throw it off balance...

en:
Um, first you attack
the enemy to throw
it off balance...
es:
Mmm, primero has de
atacar al enemigo para
desestabilizarlo...
ja:
Um, first you attack
the enemy to throw
it off balance...

en: Add an attack and prepare for the Fatal Strike.
es: Añade un ataque y prepárate para el ataque letal.
ja: Add an attack and prepare for the Fatal Strike.

en:
I see my opening 
to attack!
es:
¡Veo la manera de
empezar el ataque!
ja:
I see my opening 
to attack!

en: Press <06>(CBR2) to trigger a Fatal Strike.
es: Pulsa <06>(CBR2) para ejecutar el ataque letal.
ja: Press <06>(CBR2) to trigger a Fatal Strike.

en: Nah, I was just copying what I saw.
es: Nah, tan solo me he limitado a imitar.
ja: Nah, I was just copying what I saw.

en:
I didn't think it was the sort of thing 
you can just copy like that...
es:
No pensaba que fuera la clase de movimiento
que se pudiera imitar así, sin más...
ja:
I didn't think it was the sort of thing 
you can just copy like that...

en:
Well, you need a little 
skill, but it's not 
really that hard.
<PAGE>
You think you could do 
it while watching me?
es:
Bueno, hace falta algo
de maña, pero no es
para tanto, en serio.
<PAGE>
¿Creéis que podréis hacerlo
después ver cómo lo he hecho?
ja:
Well, you need a little 
skill, but it's not 
really that hard.
<PAGE>
You think you could do 
it while watching me?

en:
N-no way! It takes a skilled swordsman 
to do something like that...
es:
¡N-Ni hablar! Hace falta ser un espadachín
muy diestro para hacer algo así...
ja:
N-no way! It takes a skilled swordsman 
to do something like that...

en:
I know that.
<PAGE>
But <STR>(KAR), you're not 
as bad as you make 
yourself out to be.
es:
Ya lo sé.
<PAGE>
Pero <STR>(KAR), tú no eres
tan manta como te crees.
ja:
I know that.
<PAGE>
But <STR>(KAR), you're not 
as bad as you make 
yourself out to be.

en:
The amount of EXP, LP, as well
as item drop rates increases when
you defeat an enemy with Fatal Strike.
es:
La cantidad de EXP, LP y objetos obtenidos
se incrementan cuando derrotas a un enemigo
con un ataque letal.
ja:
The amount of EXP, LP, as well
as item drop rates increases when
you defeat an enemy with Fatal Strike.

en:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!
es:
¡Despídete de tu libertad,
pues la pata vas a estirar!
ja:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!

en:
I say, prepare to face the 
Imperial Knights' ultimate fighting 
technique: the burst arte!
es:
¡Preparaos para sufrir la técnica
definitiva de los Caballeros
Imperiales: el arte explosivo!
ja:
I say, prepare to face the 
Imperial Knights' ultimate fighting 
technique: the burst arte!

en:
Again, you're claiming regular 
techniques as your own... That 
doesn't belong to the Knights!
es:
Ya estáis diciendo otra vez que
las técnicas normales son vuestras...
¡Que no pertenecen a los Caballeros!
ja:
Again, you're claiming regular 
techniques as your own... That 
doesn't belong to the Knights!

en:
The Burst Arte, huh...
I've heard of it before, but...
es:
Las artes explosivas, eh....
Había oído hablar de ellas, pero...
ja:
The Burst Arte, huh...
I've heard of it before, but...

en:
You don't know how 
it's done? You fool!
ja:
You don't know how 
it's done? You fool!

en:
I say, we shall show you!
<PAGE>
But before that happens, you'll be 
reduced to no more than a worthless 
caterpillar crawling on the ground!
es:
¡Os lo enseñaremos, proclamo!
<PAGE>
¡Pero antes os reduciremos a
nada menos que a orugas que
se arrastran por el suelo!
ja:
I say, we shall show you!
<PAGE>
But before that happens, you'll be 
reduced to no more than a worthless 
caterpillar crawling on the ground!

en:
Maybe it has something 
to do with Over Limit...
es:
Quizás tenga algo que
ver con el Límite...
ja:
Maybe it has something 
to do with Over Limit...

en:
Go! Show him 
how it's done, 
Adecor!
ja:
Go! Show him 
how it's done, 
Adecor!

en:
I say, watch me now...!
<PAGE>
The arcane arte of 
the Imperial Knights!
es:
¡Miradme ahora, proclamo!<PAGE>¡El arte arcano de los
Caballeros Imperiales!
ja:
I say, watch me now...!
<PAGE>
The arcane arte of 
the Imperial Knights!

en:
It didn't hit him! 
What are you doing?!
ja:
It didn't hit him! 
What are you doing?!

en:
Huh. Burst artes 
can be linked from 
an arcane arte.
<PAGE>
I wonder if I could imitate that...
es:
Ajá. Así que las artes
explosivas se pueden
combinar con artes arcanos.<PAGE>Podría intentarlo...
ja:
Huh. Burst artes 
can be linked from 
an arcane arte.
<PAGE>
I wonder if I could imitate that...

en:
Ha, there's no way an 
amateur could do 
something like that, I say!
es:
¡Ja! ¡Un novato como
vos jamás podrá hacerlo,
proclamo!
ja:
Ha, there's no way an 
amateur could do 
something like that, I say!

en:
Press <06>(LBN) to go 
into Over Limit.
ja:
Press <06>(LBN) to go 
into Over Limit.

en:
Wah, be careful! 
<STR>(YUR) Lowell's going 
to attack!
es:
¡Uah, ten cuidado!
¡<STR>(YUR) Lowell va a atacar!
ja:
Wah, be careful! 
<STR>(YUR) Lowell's going 
to attack!

en:
...I don't actually know any of 
those, but how about this?!
es:
¡No me sé ninguno,
pero ¿qué tal esto?!
ja:
...I don't actually know any of 
those, but how about this?!

es:
<STR>(YUR) ha aprendido el
arte arcano <03>(4)Águila demoledora<03>(0).

en:
Trigger a burst arte 
by holding <06>(ART)
after an arcane arte.
es:
Haz un arte explosivo
manteniendo pulsado <06>(ART)
después de un arte arcano.
ja:
Trigger a burst arte 
by holding <06>(ART)
after an arcane arte.

en:
I say, what a terrible 
turn of events!!
ja:
I say, what a terrible 
turn of events!!

en:
<VOICE>(VS21_174)Aah... I will never 
yield to the likes 
of you!
es:
<VOICE>(VS21_174)Aah... ¡No pienso
ceder ante gente
como vosotros!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS21_174)Aah... I will never 
yield to the likes 
of you!

en: <VOICE>(VS27_125)Aren't you cutting it a bit close?
ja: <VOICE>(VS27_125)Aren't you cutting it a bit close?

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_126)Hey, these people didn't pay good 
money to see a rigged fight.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_126)Oye, esta gente no se ha dejado los
cuartos para ver un combate amañado.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_126)Hey, these people didn't pay good 
money to see a rigged fight.

en: <VOICE>(VS27_127)You could at least ease up a little.
es: <VOICE>(VS27_127)Podrías al menos no ir tan a la tremenda.
ja: <VOICE>(VS27_127)You could at least ease up a little.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_128)Like you're having any 
trouble blocking me.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_128)Como si te costara algo
bloquear mis ataques.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_128)Like you're having any 
trouble blocking me.

en: <VOICE>(VS27_129)So, care to explain what you're doing here?
es: <VOICE>(VS27_129)Bueno, ¿te importaría decirme qué haces tú aquí?
ja: <VOICE>(VS27_129)So, care to explain what you're doing here?

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_130)You know, knightly duties and such. 
Afraid that's all I can say.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_130)Ya sabes, en misiones de los Caballeros y cosas
de esas. Me temo que no puedo decirte más.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_130)You know, knightly duties and such. 
Afraid that's all I can say.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_131)Since when is becoming the champion 
of the Coliseum a duty? Especially 
for a captain of the Knights...
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_131)¿Y desde cuándo tienen los Caballeros como misión
convertirse en campeones del coliseo? Sobre todo
uno de sus capitanes...
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_131)Since when is becoming the champion 
of the Coliseum a duty? Especially 
for a captain of the Knights...

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_133)I think it's great you're taking your 
promotion so seriously, but be careful you 
don't bite off more than you can chew.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_133)Me alegro de que te tomes tu ascenso tan
en serio, pero ten cuidado. Ya sabes que
quien mucho abarca, poco aprieta.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_133)I think it's great you're taking your 
promotion so seriously, but be careful you 
don't bite off more than you can chew.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_134)You're the one taking this seriously. 
It's been a while since I've seen 
you enjoy anything this much.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS27_135)And don't you think it's 
about time you returned 
Her Highness?
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_134)Eres tú el que se lo toma en serio.
Hacia tiempo que no te veía disfrutando
tanto de algo.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS27_135)
¿Y no crees que ya va siendo
hora de que devuelvas a
Su Alteza?
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_134)You're the one taking this seriously. 
It's been a while since I've seen 
you enjoy anything this much.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS27_135)And don't you think it's 
about time you returned 
Her Highness?

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_136)You'll have to take 
that up with the 
lady herself.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_136)Eso tendrás que hablarlo
con la señorita.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_136)You'll have to take 
that up with the 
lady herself.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_137)Her Highness tends not 
to listen to the things 
I tell her.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_137)Su Alteza tiende a no
escuchar las cosas
que le digo.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_137)Her Highness tends not 
to listen to the things 
I tell her.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_138)Yeah, well, Her Highness isn't 
particularly fond of taking 
my advice either.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_138)Ya, bueno, da la casualidad de
que Su Alteza tampoco es que le
haga mucho caso a mis consejos.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_138)Yeah, well, Her Highness isn't 
particularly fond of taking 
my advice either.

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_139)Well, shall we put an end 
to this little show?
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_139)Well, shall we put an end 
to this little show?

en:
<VOICE>(VS27_140)How? If we quit now, 
they'll boo us out 
of the building.
es:
<VOICE>(VS27_140¿Cómo? Si lo dejamos ahora,
nos sacarán del recinto
a abucheo limpio.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_140)How? If we quit now, 
they'll boo us out 
of the building.

en: <VOICE>(VB38_0703)Urgh, now you've gone and done it!
ja: <VOICE>(VB38_0703)Urgh, now you've gone and done it!

en:
<VOICE>(VB34_0703)He he he...
I think we're about even now.
es:
<VOICE>(VB34_0703)Je, je, je...
Creo que ya estamos en paz.
ja:
<VOICE>(VB34_0703)He he he...
I think we're about even now.

es: <VOICE>(VS47_052)P-Parece que he de ir con cuidado.

<VOICE>(VS47_053)Ay... Uuf...
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS47_054)N-No pasa nada.
¡Esto no es nada!

en:
<VOICE>(VS47_055)I-I've gotta protect them. 
No more running...!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS47_055)I-I've gotta protect them. 
No more running...!

en: <VOICE>(VS49_065)It's no good! She can't hear a thing we're sayin'!!
es: <VOICE>(VS49_065)¡Es inútil! ¡¡No puede oír ná de lo que le decimos!!
ja: <VOICE>(VS49_065)It's no good! She can't hear a thing we're sayin'!!

en: <VOICE>(VS49_066)I'll admit, I didn't include this in our gameplan...!
ja: <VOICE>(VS49_066)I'll admit, I didn't include this in our gameplan...!

en: <VOICE>(VS49_070)Can she really not hear us? She has to! Right, <STR>(EST_P)?!
es: <VOICE>(VS49_070)¿De verdad no nos oye? ¡Tiene que poder! ¡¿Verdad, <STR>(EST_P)?!
ja: <VOICE>(VS49_070)Can she really not hear us? She has to! Right, <STR>(EST_P)?!

en: <VOICE>(VS49_071)...Man, is this just fate? We can't stop it?!
ja: <VOICE>(VS49_071)...Man, is this just fate? We can't stop it?!

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_054)Well aren't you something? 
I suppose it's time to 
reveal my true power!
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_054)No esstá nada mal.
¡Supongo que va siendo horra de
rrevelarr mi verrdaderro poderr!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_054)Well aren't you something? 
I suppose it's time to 
reveal my true power!

en: <VOICE>(VS51_058)Hey, if he tries to use it like that...!
ja: <VOICE>(VS51_058)Hey, if he tries to use it like that...!

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_122)Hey boss, so you 
really want to go 
through with this?
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_122)Bueno, jefe, ¿de
verdá quieres seguir
adelante con esto?
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_122)Hey boss, so you 
really want to go 
through with this?

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_123)Must I put up with such 
questions even from you?
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_124)None of you--NONE--thinks 
the empire is in the right.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_123)¿Tú también vas a importunarme
con preguntas así?
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_124)Ninguno de vosotros... NINGUNO cree
que el Imperio tiene derecho.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_123)Must I put up with such 
questions even from you?
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_124)None of you--NONE--thinks 
the empire is in the right.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_125)The ends don't always 
justify the means, boss. 
These kids taught me that.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_125)Er fin no siempre justifica
los medios, jefe. He aprendío
eso d'estos chavales.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_125)The ends don't always 
justify the means, boss. 
These kids taught me that.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_126)...I could never agree with 
your way of doing things, 
a way that is filled with pain.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_127)If you truly have no intention 
of changing your ways, then...
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_126)Yo jamás podría estar de acuerdo
con semejantes actos...
Con un camino tan lleno de dolor.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_127)Si en verdad no tenéis intención
de cambiar de parecer, entonces...
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_126)...I could never agree with 
your way of doing things, 
a way that is filled with pain.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_127)If you truly have no intention 
of changing your ways, then...

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_128)The guilds and the empire both 
have good points. You can't just 
wipe them out and start over.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_128)Tanto el Imperio como los gremios
tienen sus cosas buenas. No puede
aniquilarlos a ambos para empezar de cero.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_128)The guilds and the empire both 
have good points. You can't just 
wipe them out and start over.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_129)Using force will surely breed 
resentment and contempt.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_130)You do know that, don't you?
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_129)Haciendo las cosas por la fuerza solo
conseguirás sembrar resentimiento y desprecio.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_130)Lo sabes, ¿verdad?
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_129)Using force will surely breed 
resentment and contempt.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_130)You do know that, don't you?

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_131)There's no guarantee the 
world you'd make would be 
any better than this one!
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_131)¡Nada asegura que el mundo
que construyas vaya a ser
mejor que este!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_131)There's no guarantee the 
world you'd make would be 
any better than this one!

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_132)Nobody's gonna buy what 
a bastard like you says.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_132)Nadie va a tragarse lo que
diga un cabrón como tú.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_132)Nobody's gonna buy what 
a bastard like you says.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_133)I see my explanations are 
wasted on you. The small-
minded always fear change.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_134)However, all the aer in the 
world is now in my grasp. 
You have no hope of victory.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_133)Veo que pierdo el tiempo intentando
explicároslo. Los cortos de entendederas
siempre han temido los cambios.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_134)No obstante, tengo a mi alcance
todo el aer del mundo. No tenéis
posibilidad alguna de victoria.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_133)I see my explanations are 
wasted on you. The small-
minded always fear change.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_134)However, all the aer in the 
world is now in my grasp. 
You have no hope of victory.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_135)Yeah, right. You're still trying to figure 
out the formula for this place.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_135)Sí, claro. Todavía sigues intentando
comprender la fórmula de este lugar.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_135)Yeah, right. You're still trying to figure 
out the formula for this place.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_137)This guy still hasn't completely 
unlocked Zaude's controls.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_137)Este tío aún no ha desbloqueado
los controles de Zaude.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_137)This guy still hasn't completely 
unlocked Zaude's controls.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_139)...Ah yes, <STR>(RIT) Mordio. 
How very careless of me.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_139)Ah, claro... <STR>(RIT) Mordio.
Menudo descuido he tenido.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_139)...Ah yes, <STR>(RIT) Mordio. 
How very careless of me.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_140)Are you serious? And you 
think you can change the 
world? Don't make me laugh.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_140)¿Va en serio? ¿Y sigues pensando
que alguien como tú puede cambiar
el mundo? No me hagas reír.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_140)Are you serious? And you 
think you can change the 
world? Don't make me laugh.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_141)How very right you are.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_142)Very well, then this will be 
one more trial along my path 
to my rightful place as ruler.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_143)Hnnn!!
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_141)Muy cierto.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_142)De acuerdo, que sea esta entonces
una prueba más en mi senda hacia
mi legítimo lugar como soberano.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_143)¡¡Nnnn!!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_141)How very right you are.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_142)Very well, then this will be 
one more trial along my path 
to my rightful place as ruler.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_143)Hnnn!!

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_150)You will be the first 
sacrifice made for the new 
world's dawn. ...Come!!
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_150)Vosotros seréis el primer
sacrificio para el nacimiento
del nuevo mundo... ¡¡Vamos!!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_150)You will be the first 
sacrifice made for the new 
world's dawn. ...Come!!

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_151)...Whoa, whoa whoa. 
I thought he didn't have 
all of Zaude's power yet?
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_151)Hala, hala, hala....
Creía que todavía no tenía
tó el poder de Zaude.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_151)...Whoa, whoa whoa. 
I thought he didn't have 
all of Zaude's power yet?

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_152)He doesn't, but he 
may have enough.
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_152)Y no lo tiene, pero puede
que tenga el suficiente.
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_152)He doesn't, but he 
may have enough.

en:
<VOICE>(VS51_153)Heh, he's betting the 
world on this. He's gotta 
pull out all the stops.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_154)Let's go!
es:
<VOICE>(VS51_153)Je, está apostando el
mundo entero. Y va a ir
a por todas.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_154)¡Vamos allá!
ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_153)Heh, he's betting the 
world on this. He's gotta 
pull out all the stops.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_154)Let's go!

en:
This is definitely
no regular monster...
es:
Este monstruo no tiene
ni un pelo de normal.
ja:
This is definitely
no regular monster...

en:
Sometimes it's better to run
when it gets too much.
es:
Si ves que no puedes,
a veces es mejor huir.
ja:
Sometimes it's better to run
when it gets too much.

en:
Maybe it's better to
run from this one...
es:
Tal vez sea mejor
que huyamos...
ja:
Maybe it's better to
run from this one...

en: Let's make a run for it..
ja: Let's make a run for it..

en:
It's better to run when
it gets too much.
es:
Cuando algo te va grande,
a veces es mejor huir.
ja:
It's better to run when
it gets too much.

en:
Let's make a run for it
while we still can.
ja:
Let's make a run for it
while we still can.

en:
My blade is calling...
But I think we better run from this one.
es:
Mi acero me lo pide...
Pero creo que lo mejor será huir.
ja:
My blade is calling...
But I think we better run from this one.
